title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: Dune
description: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people.

title: Foundation
description: A saga of humanity scattered on planets throughout the galaxy all living under the rule of the Galactic Empire.

title: The Last of Us
description: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl.

title: The Mandalorian
description: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a mutated monster-hunter for hire, journeys toward his destiny in a turbulent world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

title: Stranger Things
description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.

title: The Expanse
description: In the near future, two strangers' lives collide in a solar system torn apart by political divides.

title: The Crown
description: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with lung cancer teams up with his former student to secure his family's future by manufacturing and selling crystal meth.

title: The Office
description: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

title: Parasite
description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
